name: Computer Organization
description: Principles of the design and operation of digital computers. Binary data representation and manipulation, Boolean logic, components of computer systems, memory technology, peripherals, structure of a CPU, assembly languages, instruction execution, and addressing techniques. There are a number of laboratory periods in which students conduct experiments with digital logic circuits.
prerequisites: [CSCA48H3 or PSCB57H3] and [CGPA 2.75 or enrolment in a CSC Subject POSt or enrolment in a non-CSC Subject POSt for which this course is needed to satisfy program requirements]]
